headline: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi Says 'Majority Of Our Trips' Could Be Fulfilled By Robots Within 20 Years: 'You Have To Get The Regulations Up'
summary: Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:UBER) chief executive officer Dara Khosrowshahi said he expects robotaxis to handle most trips on the platform within two decades as the company accelerates its push into autonomous vehicle technology. Robotaxi Expansion Push On Monday, Khosrowshahi said in a podcast on The Diary of a CEO interview that the majority of Uber rides could eventually be fulfilled by automated vehicles, though he acknowledged the shift will take 15 to 20 years.
